s2.ptxt: Install the protector with the 3 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FUEL CUT OFF VALVE ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Install the fuel cut off valve.

atten4.ptxt: Rotate the fuel cutoff valve so that its shape matches the installation area of the fuel tank.

s2.ptxt: Install the fuel tube to the fuel tank vent tube.
Install a new gasket to the fuel tank vent tube.
Install the fuel tank vent tube with the 4 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FUEL SUCTION WITH PUMP AND GAUGE TUBE ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Apply a light coat of gasoline or grease to a new gasket, and install it to the fuel tank.
Set the gauge tube on the fuel tank.

atten3.ptxt: Be careful not to bend the arm of the fuel sender gauge.

atten4.ptxt: Align the protrusion of the set plate with the groove of the fuel pump.

s2.ptxt: Install the set plate with the 8 bolts.

atten4.ptxt: Adjust the position of the set plate so that all 8 bolts can be installed to the fuel tank.

s2.ptxt: Install the 2 fuel tank tubes with the 2 tube joint clips.

item.ptxt: Check that there are no scratches or foreign objects on the connecting parts.
Check that the fuel tube joint is inserted securely.
Check that the tube joint clips are on the collars of the fuel tube joints.
After installing the tube joint clips, check that the fuel tube joints have not been pulled off.

s2.ptxt: Install 2 new fuel tank cushions.
Set the fuel tank on a mission jack.
Raise the mission jack and attach the 7 harness clips. Then, connect the fuel gauge connector to the fuel tank as shown in the illustration.
Install the 2 fuel tank bands with the 2 pins and 2 clips.
Connect the 2 fuel tank bands with the 2 bolts.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FUEL TANK FILLER PIPE SUB-ASSEMBLY

s2.ptxt: Install the filler pipe with the bolt.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT FUEL TANK TO FILLER PIPE HOSE

s2.ptxt: Connect the filler pipe hose to the fuel tank filler pipe.
Connect the fuel tank breather hose to the fuel tank filler pipe.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT FUEL MAIN TUBE AND FUEL RETURN TUBE

atten3.ptxt: Before installing the tube connectors to the pipes, check the connectors for damage and foreign matter.

s2.ptxt: Connect the return tube connector to the pipe. Then connect the main tube connector to the pipe. Push the 2 parts together firmly until a "click" sound is heard.

atten3.ptxt: Check that the connectors and pipes are securely connected by trying to pull them apart.

s2.ptxt: Install the tube clamp to the fuel tube.

s-1.ptxt: CONNECT CABLE TO NEGATIVE BATTERY TERMINAL

s2.ptxt: Perform initialization (see page ).

atten3.ptxt: Certain systems need to be initialized after disconnecting and reconnecting the cable from the negative (-) battery terminal.

s2.ptxt: Connect the intelligent tester to the DLC3.

s3.ptxt: Push the intelligent tester main switch ON.
Select the Active Test and enter the following menus: Powertrain / Engine and ECT / Active Test / Control the Fuel Pump / Speed.

s2.ptxt: Check for fuel leaks.

s3.ptxt: Check that there are no fuel leaks after performing maintenance anywhere on the fuel system.
